lead_paragraph: John Cramsey made international headlines in June when he was arrested with what the police said was a cache of weapons and ammunition.

headline.print_headline: Father in Holland Tunnel Gun Case: An Antidrug Hero, or a Vigilante?
headline.main: Father in Holland Tunnel Arms Case: Antidrug Hero, or Vigilante?

snippet: John Cramsey made international headlines in June when he was arrested with what the police said was a cache of weapons and ammunition....
abstract: Public debate has arisen over whether John Cramsey, who was arrested in Holland Tunnel in June on weapons charges, is vigilante or antidrug hero; Cramsey, whose daughter recently died of heroin overdose, claims he was en route from Lehigh County, Pa, to New York to save teenage girl in similar trouble; Cramsey has drawn scrutiny for advocating gun culture and violence against heroin dealers.
